widget.type: NEW INTERNS  |  NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES
widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Nina McKee
config.description: Hi everyone, my name is Nina McKee. I'm 22 and from the San Francisco Bay Area. I recently just graduated from SJSU with a degree in Psychology and Justice Studies. I've worked in marketing and data collection in both the private and nonprofit sectors. I love

config: to paint and draw in my free time, and I love to be in nature when I can. I look forward to working with you all.
